story: You are in your home base in the rafters of the mall. This high ground keeps you safe from the zombies while you sleep.
nav: Press 1 to go to the antiques shop, Press 2 to go to the bowling alley, Press 3 to go to the shoe store
Press 1 to go home, Press 2 to go to the Fishing Store, Press 3 to go to the Lingerie Store

Press 1 to go to the gun shop, Press 2 to go the camping store, Press 3 to go to the thrift shop

story: Unfortunately, I do not think you will find anything to help your survival here! Wait a minute, there is a trap door you did not see before. Would you like to risk it and check it out?
nav: Press 1 for hidden door, Press 2 to go back to the antique store where you know it is safe

story: Ski resorts are not open! All the liftys were turned into zombies.

story: You have made the right choice! This secret door lead you to the tunnel! You thought it was a myth all this time, congrats! You will follow this tunnel till you reach civilization. There is a population of humans behind a wall  waiting to rescue survivors. Enjoy freedom!
